titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Ethiopia
Ethiopia

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no legislation governing access to Diplomatic records.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs Archives Department Menelik II Ave. Addis Ababa (across from the Hilton)

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Diplomatic records are stored in the Archives Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Researchers must provide a research proposal and a letter of introduction to the Ministry, and must wait for approval from the relevant desk officer.
